plan-sunny-basic-001.name: Sunny Basic Connect
plan-sunny-basic-001.description: Perfect for light users who need essential connectivity. Includes unlimited talk & text.

plan-sunny-everyday-002.name: Sunny Everyday Plus
plan-sunny-everyday-002.description: Our most popular plan with a generous data allowance for streaming, browsing, and social media. Unlimited talk & text.

plan-sunny-unlimited-003.name: Sunny Unlimited Max
plan-sunny-unlimited-003.description: Go all out with unlimited high-speed data, talk, text, and 15GB of mobile hotspot. Ideal for heavy users and streamers.
plan-sunny-unlimited-003.dataAllowance: Unlimited (fair usage policy applies, 50GB high-speed then reduced)

plan-sunny-dataonly-004.name: Sunny Data Hopper
plan-sunny-dataonly-004.description: A data-only plan perfect for tablets, mobile hotspots, or as a secondary data line.
plan-sunny-dataonly-004.compatibilityNotes: No voice or SMS services included.

feature-hotspot-plus-001.name: Hotspot Plus Add-on
feature-hotspot-plus-001.description: Add an extra 10GB of high-speed mobile hotspot data to your plan.
feature-hotspot-plus-001.compatibilityNotes: Requires an active Sunny Everyday Plus or Sunny Unlimited Max plan.

feature-international-pass-002.name: International Roaming Pass
feature-international-pass-002.description: Get 1GB of data, 100 minutes, and 100 texts for use in over 50 selected countries for 7 days.
feature-international-pass-002.compatibilityNotes: Available for all SunnyMobile plans. One-time purchase, activates on first use abroad.

feature-sunny-secure-003.name: Sunny Secure Shield
feature-sunny-secure-003.description: Device protection plan covering accidental damage, mechanical breakdown, and loss/theft.
feature-sunny-secure-003.compatibilityNotes: Available for eligible devices purchased from SunnyMobile within the last 30 days.

feature-hd-streaming-004.name: HD Video Streaming
feature-hd-streaming-004.description: Unlock HD video streaming (up to 1080p) on your mobile data.
feature-hd-streaming-004.compatibilityNotes: Requires Sunny Everyday Plus or Sunny Unlimited Max. May impact data usage significantly.

F004.name: Device Protection Plus
F004.compatibilityNotes: Requires active plan and eligible device.
F004.description: Covers accidental damage and extended warranty for one device.

F005.name: Unlimited International Texting
F005.description: Unlimited SMS/MMS to international numbers from within the country.

P003.name: Unlimited Data Plan
P003.description: Unlimited high-speed data, talk & text. Fair usage policy applies.

P002.name: Starter Data Plan
P002.description: Includes 5GB of high-speed data, unlimited talk & text.

P001.description: Unlimited talk and text within the country. No data included.
P001.name: Basic Talk & Text

P005.name: Data Only Plan (Tablet)
P005.description: 20GB data-only plan for tablets and mobile hotspots.

P004.name: Family Share Plan
P004.compatibilityNotes: Can add up to 3 additional lines.
P004.description: 10GB shared data for up to 4 lines, unlimited talk & text.

F002.name: Mobile Hotspot Add-on (5GB)
F002.compatibilityNotes: Requires Starter Data Plan or Unlimited Data Plan.
F002.description: Adds 5GB of data for mobile hotspot usage.
